Title: Relates to the residential parking system in the village of Croton-on-Hudson
Summary: Adds Benedict Boulevard between South Riverside Avenue and Hastings Avenue to the Croton-on-Hudson residential parking system.
LawCode: Amd ยง1640-q, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the residential parking system in the village of Croton-on-Hudson
